txt.en:
'[placeholder], I would like to know more about why the water systems of the Great Delving are not operational. I do not relish the idea of our expedition needing to rely upon imported water.

'There is a Cooling Chamber not far from here, and perhaps we should investigate it. I am not unfamiliar with such systems, so I believe I will be useful in trying to get the system working again.'

<rgb=#FF0000>Note: This instance is intended for solo players, but can be completed with up to two people in a fellowship.</rgb>

'Thank you for your assistance, [placeholder]! I would not have been able to restore those systems by myself with so many goblins at hand. You have done much for the Dolven-view camp, but I believe we are ready to fend for ourselves. The Deep Descent awaits you!'

'Are you ready to leave? I don't know what is going on inside the cooling chamber, but I know we must move quickly if we wish to find out.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Note: This instance is intended for solo players, but can be completed with up to two people in a fellowship.</rgb>
The Cooling Chamber is an ancient structure used to collect, cool, and purify the hot steam from the forges below.
The cooling chamber has been restored
Explore the cooling chamber with Slagvi
Slagvi is at the Dolven-view camp.\n\nSlagvi wishes to enter the Cooling Chamber in hopes to restore the Great Delving's natural water system to an operational state.
Talk to Slagvi at the Dolven-view camp
Slagvi is at the Dolven-view camp.\n\nYou should speak with Slagvi.
